# getRequiredEnv

get environment variable or throw.

import:
```typescript copy
import { getRequiredEnv } from '@fullstacksjs/toolbox'
```

usage:
```typescript copy
getRequiredEnv<TEnvKey, TValue>(name)
```

example:
```typescript copy
// FOO=foo BAR=bar node
getRequiredEnv<TEnvKey>('FOO');        // foo
getRequiredEnv<TENvKey>('BAR');        // Error: BAR is required
```
